Prepare
1) copy boost.tar.gz from \\nj-fs\home\AD1004\boost_1_58_0\headers to this folder and unzip it. boost.tar.gz contains boost header files mainly.
2) copy relative boost library from \\nj-fs\home\AD1004\boost_1_58_0\libraries to 3rd_party/boost/lib and unzip it according to your platform. (You should find '3rd_party/boost/lib/windows/win32/libboost_thread-vc100-mt-1_58.lib' on windows, '3rd_party/boost/lib/centos/x64/release/libboost_thread.a' on centos)
